question:
Which of the following Statemens(s) is/are true regarding the Non-Aligned Movement(NAM)?
  1. The term “non-alignment” was coined by V.K. Krishna Menon in 1953.
  2. Panchsheel principles of Jawaharlal Nehru served as the basis of the Non-Aligned Movement.
  3. The founding fathers of the NAM were: Sukarno of Indonesia, Jawaharlal Nehru of India, Josip Broz Tito of Yugoslavia, Gamal Abdul Nasser of Egypt and Kwame Nkrumah of Ghana.
